items.title: Apple had an ugly week. Here’s why it’s worth buying, investor Nancy Tengler says
items.description: Tengler, an investor known for her "old economy" stock plays, appeared on CNBC's "Power Lunch" on Friday to give her hot takes.

items.title: This ETF is a ‘standout’, according to Morningstar — and provides tax-free income
items.description: Capital Group's municipal income ETF is among the top performers in its category, according to Morningstar.

items.title: This housing-related stock looks ready to take another leg down, says Carter Worth
items.description: The chart analyst breaks down Sherwin-Williams.

items.title: Tesla still has 40% more downside even after tumbling 50% since December, says Wells Fargo
items.description: Wells Fargo analyst Colin Langan cut his 12-month price target to $130 from $135 on Friday and reiterated an underweight investment opinion.
